AI Description: TargetP is a bioinformatics tool used for predicting the subcellular localization of eukaryotic proteins.
Core Features: Predicts the presence of N-terminal signal and transit peptides, secretion pathways, subcellular locations, and cleavage sites in proteins.
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Protein Localization, Subcellular Localization, Eukaryotic Proteins, Prediction Tool
